58.description: excellent prices and great quality. I got my gorgeous couch for $450! What a steal.  I ordered and was available for pick up 2 days later. (Delivery wasn't too expensive either, but we have a truck)When i inquired about a matching item to the couch he said it wasn't worth the price for the quality.  I really appreciate their truthfulness of the product. I will definitely purchase from here again

56.description: So I jumped the gun and decided to join the ever rising percentage of people who choose to 'cohabitate' before marriage. Or as my mother would say,'Living in Sin'.... Already a sour subject back at the home front, I knew this move would be on my own. Thank god I had zero furniture.. but with that being said.. I had ZERO furniture. After many failed attempts surfing the Internet for some deals, I realized that nothing beats shopping for a couch in person. I actually read some amazing Yelp reviews about this place and decided it was definitely worth a shot if I could find a sectional no more than $1,000. Booyah grandma, not only did I find a couch under my budget at just $750 but I also had them deliver it for just a small fee of $60. All in all, the delivery went smooth and now I am enjoying my lovely comfy couch! Easiest purchase thus far on this furnishing mission...

29.description: -Very small parking lot-Entrance looks sketchy but it is a store!-Furniture crammed into a small space; more like a factory.-Salesperson wasn't pushy at all. They let you wander alone and look at catalogs without hovering-They have tons of catalogs you can order furniture from-Delivery charge $60-They couldn't fit the sofa in the elevator so they needed to take the stairs [we live on the 5th floor]The stairs weren't part of the delivery charge so we needed to pay an extra $50

42.description: This place is great!  We walked in and didn't feel that pushy salesman vibe that we had gotten at other furniture stores. We told the guy behind the counter (I think his name was Andy) what dimensions we were looking for for our new couch. He knew exactly which couches fit the dimensions, pointed them out and went back to his business. Didn't follow us around like at other places. We browsed around a bit and found the one. We ended up finding 2 runner rugs as well that are great. They have a huge quality selection here with very reasonable prices. As we were checking out we were chatting a bit with Andy.  He was a very nice guy and he ended up throwing in 2 rug gripper pads for free. Just because. I felt so great leaving this store because we finally found the perfect couch and after having the couch for almost 2 months we still love it. It is so comfortable!!  And the rugs look great too. Thank you for making my shopping experience a good one.

23.description: Super cheap furniture store with amazing prices. My husband and I found the perfect couch for only $650. Our budget was up to $1500. The store worker was super nice and not at all pushy. Delivery is only $60, which is like less than half the price of most stores. The place does look a little worn down but they really do have a nice selection of couches and ottomans. Selection is a bit limited for anything else. My only wish is that the place would be bigger because, if they were able to carry more supply, I think I would have bought more from here.

47.description: AMAZING!  This place is great!  I live in Logan/West Bucktown so it was super easy to get to.  The owner was very nice and showed me all available items (I was looking for a dinner room table and 4 chairs) within my price range.  I had gone on the website and picked out one I wanted then the owner told me that they have one that was only 20 bucks more and was a much better quality.  They did same day delivery (because I live close) and assembled all the pieces.  The price total was $400, cheaper than anything I could find on craigslist/west elm/CB2 and far superior quality than Ikea/Target.  I would for sure go back for more furniture if I need or see anything of interest.  They have a really wide range of stuff from modern to classic styles.  Would recommend!!

8.description: This place was, in a word, awesome! I thought I had typed in the wrong address because it was essentially a shed in a gravel parking lot that looked more like a junkyard. Inside, there were two rows of furniture, mainly couches, and they were all very nice! Andy assisted me in finding the right one (which involved climbing a ladder to the second level) and then helped me pick out a dresser. The delivery fee was also very small compared to other places AND he said they could deliver that day.I scheduled for the next day, so Carlos & his colleague arrived at my place right on time. They were fast, efficient, and so incredibly friendly! They moved in a large sofa + a beautiful solid wood dresser in under 20 minutes!I will definitely be coming back to purchase a new bed!

31.description: Firstly, this is hands down one of the best places to get great value for furniture with an honest and reliable customer experience!  After dealing with Ashely Furniture's (Niles location) insane delivery time policies (waiting for at least 3 weeks) for furniture that was in the showroom, we were happy to find the same, if not better, pieces of furniture for cheaper (even considering the discounts that Ashley's throws in for you) and much faster (within 1 week).  Also, loved working with JT.  He was super honest about the value and quality of the furniture. He's very pleasant to work with and provided some great advice. One disclaimer that I feel compelled to mention is that you need to 1) do your homework beforehand to see what you're looking for and 2) don't expect a top-notch walk-through furniture shopping experience. 1) We went to Ashley's and a few other furniture stores with a showroom to get an idea of what we wanted and how it would fit for us.  This made our trip to the Furniture Outlet that much more productive!  Also, the place isn't really designed to be a show room, so a lot of options might require you to look through their catalog.  But, if you're prepared beforehand, this stuff feels like a piece of cake. 2) The store is tucked away near Fullerton and Elston and isn't really much to look at when comparing to the more established chains and high end show rooms.  However, you have good parking and you get great deals on furniture. At least for Ashley's furniture (which half of their inventory comes from) is 40% cheaper here than the listed retail prices at the Ashely's store.  Also, you don't need to worry about pushy sales people here that you might at other places.  Delivery is reasonable for assembly and drop off. We purchased a mattress set (memory foam), bedroom set, 2 sofas, 1 love seat, and coffee tables.  We got great deals (trust me, we shopped around!) and the shipping/assembly for $100.  One more tip, ask about price matching if you found something similar or the same stuff at another store. Enjoy the experience!  We loved it!

34.description: Andy the owner is so nice and very funny! He was very helpful with guiding me towards my purchase of a dining room set, even advising me against getting a more expensive version since it would be too big. The prices are very reasonable. I would highly recommend this place for those on a budget but still looking for good furniture.It's a little cold in the showroom. It's also tricky finding the entrance/driveway to the place, you almost feel like you're in the wrong spot. But other than that, it's a gem once you do find it!

16.description: If I could give this 3.5 stars I would but I can't so a 3 it is:The Good:*The furniture is affordable given the quality and Andy is willing to work with you further on price if you can be flexible in certain areas. Delivery cost is also very reasonable.*They have a limited amount of items in their store but countless other options in catalogs.The Bad:*My coffee table glass had a scratch on it and one of my nightstands was chipped pretty badly on the corner. I asked for a replacement for the glass and got no response so didn't even bother mentioning the nightstand when I saw it.*The delivery guys were quick but they arrived over an hour earlier than they were supposed to and then left a bit of a mess on the way out.*They noticed the bedroom furniture was damaged before sending to me and ended up having to deliver new items three weeks after the rest of the pieces I had purchased. When I asked for a dresser mirror as compensation for the additional wait they quickly denied the request and didn't feel the need to do anything extra for me.

13.description: Great price, lots of options for furniture. Definitely better then going to any large retailer. My brother bought a couch here and referred me to the place. Had no trouble finding a couch for the right price.

11.description: I had a ridiculously pleasant experience at furniture outlet. I was dreading the sofa search, but the furniture outlet made it very easy. Andy was very laid back and helpful. The furniture was inexpensive yet of good quality- discount for cash. Carlos and his guy made delivery very seamless and even moved my previous sofa into another room for me. I would go back here again.

39.description: Huge selection at great prices must check out

37.description: I agree with the numerous glowing reviews.  The location may seem a bit odd and the overflowing show room can be overwhelming but man this place is a steal!  Ordered a great (cheap!) couch on Sunday afternoon, paid the $60 for delivery, and was sitting on said couch by Monday night at 5:30 PM.  The staff was helpful, delivery was SO quick (even in my third floor walk-up) and I no longer have to sit on the floor. A+!

0.description: We just purchased a sofa set, dining table with chairs, coffee table, and end table. Andy was helpful in helping us pick out the right pieces. Their prices are fair and the quality of the furniture is excellent. The delivery went smooth. They arrived on time, set everything up fast, and were patient and friendly since we had movers coming in and out with boxes as they set up the furniture. Highly recommend!

38.description: That might have been the easiest furniture shopping experience I have ever had. No pressure, fair prices...you cannot beat it.

51.description: This place is great and comes highly recommended. Every sales person we dealt with prior to coming here was very pushy Andy lets his product and price speak  for themselves. If your looking to get great furniture for your home without feeling harassed please come here to take a look and you will most certainly make a purchase.

27.description: Absolutely best furniture shopping experience.  As other Yelpers have said, when you pull in the parking lot you think "Wha?" but trust me, it's a great place to find decent furniture at super reasonable prices.  As long as I'm in Chicago, this will be my go to furniture store.

32.description: So reasonable and a great selection. They were super easy to work with and let me put the couch I wanted on hold until February when I would be moving. Their delivery is also super reasonable! I was impressed!

54.description: Just went here today in search of a Dresser for my bedroom.  I didn't want to spend no more that $200 for something.  The small parking lot had a big U-Haul truck parked in the middle which made for a tight squeeze for parking.  As I entered I didn't know that I would be pleasantly surprised at the nice selection of furniture esp. sofas as low as $500 and sectionals with two chaise lounges for $900.  I was approached by a very friendly Asian man.  He quoted me some prices and left me alone to decide what I wanted.  I chose a five drawer dresser that was almost as tall as me (I'm 5'7) and it was only $150/$164 plus tax.  My sis and I were worried about putting it together and even hauling in my pt cruiser.  The sales guy told me that it came already assembled and it would def. fit in my car.  It fit fine with my back seats lowered and I left happily with my purchase all within a 30 min time frame! I will def. be back for a sectional and possibly a rug at a later date.  The entrance is weird and off Elston and parking is tight.

48.description: The showroom is a lot to be desired, but they work with Ashley and another company and can get you anything you want from those companies.  Great delivery.  I have gotten couches and bedroom furniture from them.  Nothing to complain about and will be going back again when I get my recliner.

44.description: I bought a couch here last Thursday and scheduled to have it delivered today.I was given a delivery window of 2p to 4p and they called at 1:45p to make sure I was home and showed up right at 2p.They brought the couch up (3flights)  and assembled it perfectly and quickly and took all the box and mess with them.The purchase process was quick. I was able to browse and almost immediately saw the exact couch I wanted. The price was right and I paid and was out in less than 15 minutes. I love the couch and am happy to recommend furniture outlet.

24.description: Walked in today in need of a new couch. They had a huge selection and at a great price. I picked what I wanted, scheduled it to be delivered, and was out in less than half an hour. Brand new Ashley couch with chaise for $550 + $60 deliver fee. I would definitely recommend this place to friends in the market for new furnishings.

7.description: I ordered a couch/sofa from this company after reading many positive reviews. This review isn't on the couch/sofa because I love it, it's about the delivery.This was a 90 degree day in September. Delivery was on-time, but the 2 individuals that delivered it were bringing it into my apartment and knocked down the electrical box, causing all of the power to go out in my place. I went down and checked the fuses and they were tripping so I had to call an electrician who wouldn't be able to come by for 24 hours because nothing was working.When I asked what happened to the delivery guys (2 men), they said that the box they knocked off was just a doorbell (the 1 mentioned to me that he had stolen many in his day so he knows what they look like). Well, it wasn't a doorbell. I had to pay $300 to have it fixed and sent pictures to the owners of Furniture Outlet and had to keep following up with them for 4-5 weeks before they finally told me that they weren't going to do anything. TERRIBLE customer experience. I will never refer someone here because if they break something in your place, they won't pay for it or follow up or try and make it right. There are many other options like MARJEN: marjenofchicago.com

49.description: Can't say enough good things about this place.  Andy the owner was the nicest guy ever and most helpful.  He offered to order two different sofas for me and let me pick the one i liked best and said he was sure someone would eventually buy the other.  Delivery was good price and the 2 set that we got was the best price in the city and prolly the whole state.  We got Ashley furniture here and It looks great!Don't judge a book by its cover on this one.  It might look beat up on the outside, but this is were you want to go trust me.  Don't waste your time anywhere else.

40.description: The best furniture shopping experience I have ever had! I would not buy furniture anywhere else. One stop shop, we bought barstools, tv stand, and a great comfy couch all in under an hour. Took it home that night! The owner was so helpful and so nice! Love this place would recommend this place to everyone!

53.description: Owner was really helpful, and we got a comfortable couch, much bigger than we expected, delivered, for around $860. Would/will go back, and definitely recommend to all.

30.description: I've bought so much furniture from here... Andy is amazing, #1 in customer service in all of Chicago!

46.description: tiny place, no parking, no help, furniture on top of each other. no sure the quality of the couches, saw some on the floor that were parting at the seems.

1.description: Ok guys what are you expecting from a discount furniture store? This isn't Restoration Hardware. For the price and quality it's as good as it gets. Hello...the name is Furniture Outlet, nothing screams fancy service about this place. You get good value for what you pay. They have a pretty big selection of nice, modern furniture. Albeit, I don't think it'll last decades but its good for trendy decor or if your on a tight budget and want to skip Ikea.As noted in other reviews the customer service isn't the best, but I'm fairly confident it's not on purpose. The owner doesn't speak english very well and he is older so work with him a bit. He is extremely patient and nice. I called him like 6x telling him to deliver it first and at 6pm. We all know they give you a time window but he actually listened and delivered at my time request. The assembly team was quick, efficient and did a good job of assembling my furniture. I just moved to Chicago for work and it was a very last minute move. For them to be so quick with delivery (next day) was a godsend.

55.description: The owner is so helpful and friendly.  He's very honest about the product and quality.  He would tell you if the piece doesn't worth buying instead of letting you order it from him. We went to many stores and this store has the best price for everything for any room. .He also has the 2nd floor so don't forget to check out for more stuff upstairs.

9.description: It was 37 degrees inside the place. Only thing colder was the sales guy. Asked what I was looking for. End tables, I replied. He laughed. Pointed to a selection of a dozen or so options. Said that's 'all he has'. He then turned and walked away? Shouted back saying I'd be better off going to target or Marshalls! 100% would've bought 2 or 3 of the available options, but not there. And not from a sales guy who tells me to shop at the competition... Bad.

26.description: I don't get it?  I was not impressed, as I prefer Affordable Portables, Value City and Ashley all better.  I thought their prices were higher, styles were out dated and the warehouse is a dump.  Not for me, sorry.

25.description: Andy's great! Got my sofa bed and it works great! Price was just right too. Communication for the delivery was phenomenal.

12.description: The entrance is a little sketchy, I wouldn't have noticed the place if I hadn't searched for furniture online! But it's right around the corner of my work, so I walked over on my lunch break to check out recliners. They have a decent selection for affordable prices! The guy there is so nice, his name is Andy. I bought the recliner and had it delivered on the weekend. The guys arrived 20 mins early and brought the recliner up in two pieces and snapped it together real quick. All was well! And the whole "family" loves it! Will return for any furniture needs in the future!

59.description: I was extremely unhappy with this business. I had high expectations coming in after reading all of the reviews here on yelp. I was looking for a king bed and made the trip all of the way over to the store only to have the employee tell me just to go online and send them any emails with questions. I did this and although the website is laid out well, I inquired about 3 different beds and only received a response on one of the emails. I then went to try to buy this bed online and I tried with 3 different credit cards and each time it said that the transaction was declined. I then called Furniture Outlet and they said that they had heard they were having issues with that and to just email them with specifically what you wanted and they will hold it and get back to me. Well, I sent two more emails saying that I could even pay cash if need be and never received a response. I gave them one last shot about 10 days after this and tried ordering the bed online again and it still said that the transaction was declined. I still haven't gotten a response and I'm now heading over to the Room Place to get my bed.

21.description: Andy is the best! He is so helpful and I've gotten plenty of quality furniture for GREAT prices! Thanks Andy and the rest of the crew!!!

17.description: I don't get it?  I was not impressed, as I prefer Affordable Portables, Value City and Ashley all better.  I thought their prices were higher, styles were out dated and the warehouse is a dump.  Not for me, sorry.

10.description: -Very small parking lot-Entrance looks sketchy but it is a store!-Furniture crammed into a small space; more like a factory.-Salesperson wasn't pushy at all. They let you wander alone and look at catalogs without hovering-They have tons of catalogs you can order furniture from-Delivery charge $60-They couldn't fit the sofa in the elevator so they needed to take the stairs [we live on the 5th floor]The stairs weren't part of the delivery charge so we needed to pay an extra $50

5.description: The 4 stars is for product! We walked in and walked out 20 min later with a sectional! The man helping us was friendly and funny. Pleasant experience in the store. The couch is comfy, clean and very nice overall. Outstanding prices! HOWEVER I rate the delivery as a 2.0! The delivery was on time but the delivery men were quite impatient and rude. I think this company needs to address this issue! They spoke to me with little to no respect. I honestly was quite infuriated. Nothing like the nice man from Vietnam we met at the store!

3.description: I had purchased my couch from furniture outlet inc over a month ago and I am incredibly happy with it! The service at the store was outstanding! Helpful and yet not pushy. There were 0 of the normal sales tactics to try and get the pieces out of the store. The delivery time was unbelievable, we purchased the couch and the delivery guys almost beat us home. I have recommended furniture outlet inc to many of my friends friends and family.

35.description: I done quite a lot of research regarding the kitchen table and chairs I wanted so when I went into furniture outlet I knew what I was looking for. After browsing a bit, I settled on the dining set. JT worked with me to determine the proper size for my spacious apartment. I was shocked to learn they'd put it all together and have it delivered in 4 days (I was there Friday morning, they said they'd bring it Tuesday night)! Then, about 6 hours later, JT called me to tell me he found a set in his warehouse and if I was home, he bring it over in 30 min and have his crew assemble it in my home. I'm so excited about it, that I'm writing this as they are here putting it together!  They were in and out in 15 minutes. Unfortunately the back of one of the chairs is damaged, but they are going to bring me a new one next week. Great service, great people, great products!

19.description: Firstly, this is hands down one of the best places to get great value for furniture with an honest and reliable customer experience!  After dealing with Ashely Furniture's (Niles location) insane delivery time policies (waiting for at least 3 weeks) for furniture that was in the showroom, we were happy to find the same, if not better, pieces of furniture for cheaper (even considering the discounts that Ashley's throws in for you) and much faster (within 1 week).  Also, loved working with JT.  He was super honest about the value and quality of the furniture. He's very pleasant to work with and provided some great advice. One disclaimer that I feel compelled to mention is that you need to 1) do your homework beforehand to see what you're looking for and 2) don't expect a top-notch walk-through furniture shopping experience. 1) We went to Ashley's and a few other furniture stores with a showroom to get an idea of what we wanted and how it would fit for us.  This made our trip to the Furniture Outlet that much more productive!  Also, the place isn't really designed to be a show room, so a lot of options might require you to look through their catalog.  But, if you're prepared beforehand, this stuff feels like a piece of cake. 2) The store is tucked away near Fullerton and Elston and isn't really much to look at when comparing to the more established chains and high end show rooms.  However, you have good parking and you get great deals on furniture. At least for Ashley's furniture (which half of their inventory comes from) is 40% cheaper here than the listed retail prices at the Ashely's store.  Also, you don't need to worry about pushy sales people here that you might at other places.  Delivery is reasonable for assembly and drop off. We purchased a mattress set (memory foam), bedroom set, 2 sofas, 1 love seat, and coffee tables.  We got great deals (trust me, we shopped around!) and the shipping/assembly for $100.  One more tip, ask about price matching if you found something similar or the same stuff at another store. Enjoy the experience!  We loved it!

28.description: I LOVE my new couch and I'm so pleased with the customer service I received Andy and Carlos during the delivery process.  Not only did they show up 10 minutes early, they moved quickly and left me with a beautiful new piece of furniture.  HIGHLY recommend checking out Furniture Outlet!

45.description: Was able to quickly find a couch for our new apartment. It only took us about 15 minutes to pick one out and fill out the paperwork and set a delivery date/time. We were able to get a great couch and an affordable price and have it delivered for $50. The only reason I took off a star was the delivery itself. The men were nice enough but they tried to tell us we had to pick a new couch because they wouldn't be able to get it up to our apartment. Yes it's a bigger couch and yes we live on the third floor but there WAS room in the back deck of our building. I finally convinced them to try and had to explain how they could turn in to get through the tighter spot (there was only one problem turn). I have a great couch that I didn't have to personally carry up the stairs but the whole ordeal was way more stressful than it needed to be.

33.description: I can't say enough positive things about this place.  Awesome customer service.  We bought a couch from them right before Christmas (and got a great price on it) and then noticed a defect a week later.  I called and explained what was wrong and they immediately ordered a new one and delivered it in about three weeks.  Plus the shopping experience was great - when we walked up we were a little bit wary, but it was totally legit and they let you just wander around and ask questions when you want, they don't bother you or try too hard to sell you anything and you don't feel obligated to buy from them at all.  Notwithstanding the fact that our couch was defective, their furniture is good quality, name brand and seriously affordable.

43.description: This is a GREAT find. Don't let the non-descript location fool you. Furniture Outlet is definitely worth a visit if you're in the market for a sofa, sectional, coffee table, or kitchen table and chairs. My fiance and I had been to The Roomplace and Art Van Furniture (both on Elston), but were not thrilled with quality, sizes, and style. Here, we had our pick when looking for a simple, apartment-proportioned sectional sofa. For $550 ($450 sofa + tax and $60 delivery), we got a great 85-inch wide sectional with a reversible chaise, plus delivery to our third floor unit in Lincoln Square. No complaints here!

2.description: I will begin with negative and end with positive:The movers we got were kinda rude and impatient. We have a narrow front entry door but the stairspace is tall (couch mightve fit standing). They were insistent on using the back door and once they couldnt fit through there, they had already started putting cushions away before even attempting the front door. they got into the front building door just fine, then looked at the rest of the way and said "it wont fit" without further effort. They went as far to badmouth other workers for telling us the couch would fit.The positive:The Owner Andy is veeeeery patient and not pushy at all. We were asking a million questions and were indecisive. Another employee (carlos?) was also very informative. They answer all questions honestly and dont pressure you to buy. Upon our incident with the half-assed delivery attempt we contacted the owner and he apologized and offered free redelivery if we wanted to pick something else, or a refund. We picked out a 2nd couch (2 piece sectional) and 2nd attempt went more smoothly. Pro tip: There is a 2nd floor! We missed this the first time going...

18.description: Great prices and great products! I bought so much for my new apartment there. All of it was Ashley brand. Andy is so great and helpful. Downside was that my bed frame had a small scratch where the paint was missing but otherwise wonderful experience. Cheap delivery and setup too. Very happy.

41.description: We just bought our 3rd couch from these guys. We have a very naughty cat that ruins couches, so this is the place for us to get pretty good looking couches frequently for cheaper than most crappy ikea couches. Great price, quick and prompt delivery. No problems at all.

52.description: This is a GREAT STORE! I originally bought a couch from Roy's Furniture in Lincoln park, I ordered it Nov 1 and I would still be waiting for it if I had not decided to go somewhere else. NEVER BUY ANYTHING FROM ROYS. So I went here! The best decision I made. The guy TJ was wonderful and I got my couch the very next day! They were on time and pleasant. I know that other (very few) people may have had a bad experience- I certainly read all the reviews but honestly its a great store!

50.description: What everyone else says is true. Owner Andy is super friendly and nice without giving you any pressure at all. Most of what they sell is ordered, so it may be a week or so for delivery. Delivery is inexpensive at their overall price is as competitive as it gets. My couch came earlier than expected and there was one cushion that had a tear from the manufacturer. Andy was very understanding and replaced it with a new one on the spot without any question. I'll definitely be back for any future needs.

4.description: We tried to go here... pulled in and were so confused. Looked super sketchy and weren't sure if we were in the parking lot or a tow yard, so we left. There were a few people just hanging out in the entrance of the tent, didn't scream, 'come look at our furniture!'

6.description: Great prices, great online selection (not a fancy store front if you go, as I did), and rapid delivery (got my 2 excellent chairs and an area rug in about a week).  Recommend it highly if you're watching your wallet and want pretty good quality stuff delivered fast (and without any hassle)

22.description: Loved working with Andy, super nice and honest. Couldn't be happier with the items purchased: large chevron rug for my living room, tall dresser with six drawers, and a unique accent piece for my dining room. All for $450! Oh, and delivery is WAY CHEAP!

15.description: I bought a couch here last Thursday and scheduled to have it delivered today.I was given a delivery window of 2p to 4p and they called at 1:45p to make sure I was home and showed up right at 2p.They brought the couch up (3flights)  and assembled it perfectly and quickly and took all the box and mess with them.The purchase process was quick. I was able to browse and almost immediately saw the exact couch I wanted. The price was right and I paid and was out in less than 15 minutes. I love the couch and am happy to recommend furniture outlet.

57.description: This is place is a MUST-GO if you are moving to the city and need furniture. I got my couch from here for a great price! Delivery was not expensive at all, I think $50 for our couch set but we had a truck so it didn't apply to us. Don't let the small, run down entrance steer you away. Its THE place to get good quality furniture for a great price!

20.description: Such a great experience. Reasonable prices. Good quality. Awesome, on-time delivery. Will definitely go back!

36.description: My first visit to this store when I picked out the sofa bed was great, but the follow up customer service was horrible. I informed on the day I picked out the sofa I will be back on Friday to pay and have it delivered a few days afterwards. On Friday I called ahead and said I'm on my way to pay for it. I get there and the guy providing service says I can't find your sales slip come back tomorrow and pay when the other guy is here..,,,, so disorganized because can't find my paperwork, I called ahead and informed on my way and he said ok... And it was the same guy.. Than I get there... No apology.. Just casually oh come back tomorrow... I will never go back! Waste of my time, disorganized and poor customer service.. No thanks!

14.description: This is our second time buying a couch from here. Our first couch couldn't fit in the elevator but thankfully we were able to exchange it with a 3 seater and a love seat. Still looks great in our living room! Thanks Andy and Carlos!

3.description: This place is fantastic.  Two CRAZY guys will bend over backwards to help you find what you need.  And amuse the hell out of you while you shop.  Go there.

1.description: This place has every model car, plane, doll, you can think of. If they don't have it, the owner can get it for you. She even has models that are retro and some that are collector's items. The staff are friendly and helpful. The prices are comperable to other hobby shops. This is the most complete model shop I have ever seen though. Take a look inside if you get the chance.LOVED it!

2.description: This was my first time their.  As i walked in I was greeted by a very friendly lady-owner Janice. what I was looking for is a good plastic model store. i build all types of models. Her selection of armor, ships, and aircraft is good at best. She has some rare kits but I would like more of the newer stuff in aircraft and ships. But thats just me. She excels in car kits, both in plastic and diecast, with many discontinued and rare kits. She also has a smal rairoad section as well. if us mdelers started going in her shop more I think she wouuld start catering more to us. she will ship across the country which is great also if you find that rare kit at her place. Prices are a little high but i'll pay a little more to find that kit im missing for my collection and support an owner who's willing to help out the modeler. Thanks Janice i will be back.

5.description: If low prices are your only motivation, you can probably find better prices online but then you'll miss the charm of this place and the two guys there.  It is nice to browse all the different models there, right in front of you, particularly good for beginners or those who didn't decide on a specific model yet.  It is like organized chaos  so don't expect things to be all sorted by year and model.  Set aside some time and just browse and soak it all in.  My only want is for them to have a bit more foreign car selection.  Although there's plenty of nice cars to choose from the domestic brands.

6.description: Went in to buy some paints and tools. Very helpful staff, gigantic selection. Helped me find exactly what I needed. I will definitely buy my next model here.

7.description: This place is almost hidden , it looks like a concrete bunker. You have to be buzzed in , and then you see what might be the hugest model car selection I've ever seen. You can find a model of pretty much anything you might want one of , from zeppelin to Star Destroyer. They also have a good amount of collectibles die cast cars , collectible figures and model rockets. My only gripe is that I literally couldn't fit down some of the aisles without removing my coat. The prices are near rock bottom , and the guys there bend over backward to find you what you need. If the space was bigger and a lot easier to find what you want , I would give this place 5 stars.

0.description: This place looks like a bunker with only a small door in the front but once you get in ... damn there's millions of boxes around the place.It is not very well sorted but that's ok if you aren't looking for anything specific. About two third of their stock are cars and most of them are old school american muscle and low-rides though I hope they had more Japanese kits  from Tamiya and Fujimi. They also have motorcycles,  tanks, planes, battleships, RCs, tools and paint blah blah blah. If you can't find what you're looking for the shop owner will be happy to order one for you. If I found this place when I was a kid I could probably spend a whole day in there. Definitely coming back.

4.description: Visited Forever Timeless Hobby Shop today for the first time.  As someone has already pointed out, the store is more or less a concrete bunker without giant store front windows or loud neon signs announcing its presence.  If you're into models, die cast, supplies, etc., you should check this place out, it's literally stacked from floor to ceiling with a huge selection of inventory.  I talked to two nice, knowlegable fellows working there who made it easy for me to find the Tamiya Putty I was looking for.  Since "Forever Timeless" is one of the very last surviving hobby shops in Chicago, I've got to give it 5 stars.

12.description: I've ordered from here for 3 years now and its always amazing. I always get the tacos or milanesa torta. delishhhhhhoussss

3.description: I love it.  Its my favorite place to go eat around work.  Its always clean.  Everyone is super nice.  This place is the best.  I ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND THIS RESTAURANT FOR EVERYONE.  Keep up the great work guys!:)

1.description: Everything was absolutely delicious! We were greeted with a warm smile and homemade salsa. Order was prepared in no time and everything was fresh. The server was very attentive and made sure we had everything needed. The establishment was clean with nice decorations.

2.description: I trusted the reviews and gave this place a shot. Easy paid street parking on Fullerton. The cashier was very friendly and wasn't hesitant on giving advice on what they're known for. I walked out with three tacos and a torta. Al pastor, chile relleno, and ground beef tacos and a steak torta. My total was $11.38 and didn't realize until I was home that I was left with a bag of fresh tortilla chips too! I will be making a trip back asap to try out one of their famous platillos mexicanos.

9.description: El Tapatio is my favorite maxican taqueria. The food is delicious, everything from their tacos to their caldos. The service is amazing. from the waitresses to the delivery guy. We used to live right up stairs from this place and would eat there 2x a week. We've moved further  so we go once every month at least. When we do go, the waitresses are always happy to see us. They'll always play with our son. I cannot say enough good things about this place. They are amazing. Not too pricey either.

10.description: This place is spectacular! Me and my boyfriend come by every week for their amazing tacos and fajitas. This is our mexican spot. The waitress is so nice and is very accommodating when it comes to service. If you love Mexican food and can't seem to find a place. Be sure to swing by, it will be worth it.

13.description: I alway order my nachos from here. They are delicious. The waiter even knows my name. I love when I call and she says" your order will be ready in 10 min Ruby :)'

16.description: Try the grilled chicken sandwich, and the clouds will open and angels will sing, "ahhhhhhhh".

6.description: There really isn't any good Mexican food in this area so when I found this so close to home I was excited. Really good Mexican food. The sopes are big and made like at home!

15.description: My guy introduced me to this place and I love it!Ive only ever gotten a torta till last night because they are so good I didnt want to try anything else. I finally tried the burrito, Ive neved devoured and enjoyed a burrito like that unless I was drunk. So glad I was sober to remember the tastiness.There is eveything in the torta and burrito that I love so I dont have to pay extra for the good stuff like avocado. Its a great price for lots of food.

0.description: Love this place. Food is great, staff are friendly and the prices are great for the high quality. Homemade chips and salsa are delicious and come free with every meal. Be sure to try the rib eye steak burrito. Pork tacos are delicious to. Anyone who likes mexican food should try this spot. Deserves the 5/5 star rating.

5.description: Always a pleasure coming here. Every time I'm craving a burrito and nachos, this is the first place that comes to mind. Never disappoints in the many years I've come here!

11.description: Best tacos ever! My favorite Mexican restaurant! Love it! The service is great! Definitely recommend tacos de al pastor and the tortas

8.description: Super friendly & bilingual staff.  Nice, clean and comfortable atmosphere....and awesome food!!!!  two-thumbs up!!! Plus they have wifi for you!!!

4.description: Delicious delicious! Love there al pastor meat best one I have tried. Always good service !

14.description: This place has the best tacos I have ever eaten and I have been to Mexico.  I may be a gringo but this place is my happy place!  Try any tacos, tostadas, tortas, or whatever.  The food is made with love and care.

7.description: I will give this place four stars for now because I can't say it's hands down the best Mexican food I've ever had, but it sure is damn close! I don't even know where to begin with this review, but here goes nothing...My friend lives not too far from here and since I had been dying for some real Mexican food, she suggested El Tapatio. We came inside and the place was surprisingly empty but we had our pick of seats, so that was nice. A few people came in and out, but the puny amount of guests meant we could enjoy our meal in peace. And that's exactly what we did. The server was so nice to us. She was also attentive. We needed lots of time to decided what to eat/drink but she didn't care. She just kept coming back to check on us. They had lots of TVs playing Telenovelas and it wasn't exactly what I'd call quiet, but it was fine. For a gringa like me, it's pretty funny to sit there and listen to what they're saying, trying to decipher the Spanish.We finally placed our order after having stuffed ourselves on fresh tortilla chips and spicy homemade salsa. They keep bringing them out to you pretty much once you sit down. Fairly standard at most places like this, but I thought I should make that clear you get complimentary chips and salsa with your meal. I ordered a veggie burrito dinner plate. My friend also ordered a burrito dinner and had one of the banana shakes. I went with a boring Diet Coke, but the shake was amazing. I'll definitely have that next time I come in!!! Don't make the mistake of getting the soda like I did, especially if you want the full Mexican dining experience. You can get soda anywhere, those shakes are just too yummy to pass up! The food came and the presentation was fantastic. The burrito dinners were GINORMOUS! A seriously massive burrito covered in sour cream (ours were fancy out of pastry frosting servers - see my pictures I added) served with rice, refried beans with cheese sprinkled on top and some fresh strips of lettuce, a few tomato and avocado slices. YUM! We chowed down and since my friend and I hadn't seen each other in a while, we would up staying for over 2 hours! As I said, the place wasn't busy and the waitress didn't care how long we stayed. So we gabbed away and she would periodically check on us. It couldn't have been nicer. It was like eating at home, except I could never make such yummy Mexican fare. Definitely will come back!!! Hopefully I will be able to give this place 5 stars the more places I go to.

58.description: These guys are great. Not only have they done a great job fixing my daughters iPod screen but also when I went in the other day because my phone wasn't charging they fixed it right then and there for no charge!  Thanks Joe!

56.description: I broke it and they sure did fix it in 30 min. My iphone looked good as new. The only thing was that they did not give me a work order form and insisted on not giving me my phone without an ID and were kinda jerks about it.

29.description: I just walked out of Ubreakifix. And I'm typing this on my phone. An hour ago, I was convinced I wouldn't have a phone. Apparently, the sound of panic is the sound you hear when your phone takes a dive and slaps screen down onto a concrete floor. My poor iphone was completely spiderweb shattered. After first calling my provider and being told the only way I would be able to fix this would be to pay $700+, this place was my second call. They told me to come right in, and I just beat a weekend rush because it was all fixed within about 40 minutes. It's seriously like it never happened. I will say that I was lucky, as a rush did roll in while I was waiting, but the miracle workers employed there upped the estimate time and offered next day pickups with courtesy and professionalism. An hour after something happened that I have literally had nightmares about, it was fixed. That's insane! My only regret was that I wish I called this place first. I could have saved myself a little bit of stress.

42.description: I have never written a bad yelp review before, but I am so disappointed with this place that I felt i needed to tell others. My experience with this store was always good. I never had too many problems. However, this time around... It was horrible. Absolutely nothing went well. I dropped my iPad off because the LED light had become unplugged. The iPad would turn on, but it wouldn't light up. When I dropped it off they told me one week max, to give me a diagnosis. I thought that was a little long, especially because I told them what the problem was. But I agreed to the wait time and submitted the iPad to them for a diagnosis. After a week, I never got a call to tell me that it had been diagnosed. I called and they said to give them a couple more days, and they would call me by the end of the following business day. The told me that the technician was currently working on my iPad, and that he didn't know what the diagnosis was yet but would let me know very soon. I agreed to wait longer. The time came and when again. No call. I called a THIRD time. I was told they had never got to my iPad and hadn't had a chance to diagnose it. I stated that I was told a couple days earlier, that the technician was working on it. They didn't have an explanation for that and simply said "well we haven't gotten to it yet. We're understaffed". I said "well how much more time do you need?" They said 3 more days. I agreed to wait longer... Again.Three days later... No call. I called again, they said they STILL hadn't had a chance to look at it. I stated that I'd just come pick it up and to forget about diagnosing it, I'll be taking it somewhere else. When I went to pick it up there was a woman in front of me dropping her device off for repair. I couldn't help but notice that they said they would have it fixed within an hour. I thought "An hour?! I've been waiting 2 weeks just for a diagnosis. An hour?!"I got my iPad back after two weeks of them doing absolutely nothing. They were dismissive in their willingness to understand my frustration and did NOTHING to accommodate me, despite false quote times and false promises to contact me. This was one of the worst experiences I've ever had with a company. I'll never go back.

23.description: After scouring the internet for a place to fix the cracked screen on my touchscreen laptop, I came across uBreakiFix in LP. I was pleased with the yelp reviews and saw they even had a discount deal. I saw that they specialize in cell phone screen replacements, but that they also work on the type of laptop I have, so I went for it. They were quick to work on my laptop - leaving me without it for just a few hours - and were very friendly and attentive. Unfortunately, in the process, a part of my laptop was broken. Needless to say, I was upset and concerned that I would not be taken care of, stuck with a functioning, but aesthetically displeasing laptop. This was not the case! I was contacted by Ron, the district manager who was incredibly informative, attentive, friendly, and personable through this process. My issue was solved in a timely manner, leaving me very pleased and gracious. Would definitely recommend to others.

47.description: I dropped my iPhone 6 and shattered the glass.  uBreakiFix fixed it for me in 45 minutes.  They were fast, friendly and reasonably priced.

8.description: This place is super honest. I took my phone in and they offered to take a look before replacing anything. The battery was depleting in a matter of minutes. They warned me that it may be a motherboard issue and replacing the battery may not do the trick. I told them to go ahead and replace the battery anyways. Also, they were closing in 35 minutes and didn't give me any sort of run around about closing soon. I even asked and they said it wasn't an issue. I visited a nearby coffee shop and when I came back, lucky for me, they had reinstalled the battery and it worked! Yay! They also upsold me on a glass screen that has protected my actual glass screen. It has saved my screen, so I'll be going back to get that replaced. That only takes about two minutes and costs $40? 50? Not much in comparision to another iPhone screen.

31.description: Good service & only took an hour for Iphone screen repair. Thanks for the fix!

34.description: I am extremely upset and disappointed in this store because I would bring all my devices here and recommend them to all of my friends and coworkers because of the great customer service and the quick turn around for my devices being fixed and back to me. This time though it wasn't the case at all. In June I broke my gfs iPhone screen and took it to ubrakeifix, I've had a MacBook that needed to be fixed as well so I decided to kill 2 birds with one stone. My gf was able to pick her phone up the same day but they said the MacBook would be ready in a week. I called a week later and asked if my MacBook was ready, the way the person spoke on the phone it was like they were clueless of MacBook even being there. They put me on hold and 5 mins later they find the MacBook and said they haven't had a chance to look at it yet and proceeds to ask me what is wrong with it . I remained calm and explained the issue they said ok we will take a look at it and we'll give you a call in a couple days, I never received a call. I called a week later again and asked about the MacBook, again they told me they had techs look over it, and they didn't see the issue I explained they said the hard drive just needed to be replaced. They told me the amount of the services and when the parts would be in to get my MacBook up and running, again I was told I was going to get a call back, never received that call. So 2 weeks later I call back and asked about the status of my MacBook and they say the part still hasn't come in... A month later I call again and ask the status of my MacBook, they tell me they put the hard drive in and it didn't work still. They said the techs looked over it again and IT WAS THE ISSUE I BROUGHT IT IN FOR AND EXPLAINED TO THEM OVER THE PHONE OVER A MONTH AGO! So now they have to order the parts for that. It is now the end of August and I still do not have my MacBook. I went to the location a few days ago so I can speak to someone in person to see if the were really bull shitting me, I was GUARANTEED that my MacBooks part would arrive Monday 8/24 and I would be able to pick up my device at end of day. I called twice to see if that part was in and the 1st time I was told it would arrive at 3pm I called after 5pm and was then told no shipment has arrived. My frustration is through the rough and it's taking everything in me not to go up to the business and give them a piece of my mind for wasting my time. Especially since I told them the issue in the beginning and they still made their own wrong diagnosis. I just want my device back and it's now been almost 3 months. My time has been wasted and my patience tested and they want me to pay full price. I think not. Ubrakeifix get it together! I don't think I'll be coming in anymore after this. If anyone knows any good places to take my devices too please let me know.

16.description: I would like to give negative review to ubreak because of customer service . I booked an appointment from their website for fixing a water damage of my HTC mobile. When I get at ubreak north cl office ,a guy on reception said he sent an email saying they can't fix my cell, I was thinking may be I forgot to check my emails , I came back and searched a inbox and junk folder and found no email saying same. This is really a unprofessional and makes me sad for seeing this kind of customer service. I won't recommend anyone for going to this place.

13.description: While ubreakifix was not able to fix my iPhone, it was still a good experience and I wouldn't give them lesser starts because of it. It's not their fault that my phone ended up in my puppy's water bowl and no amount of rice could save it. This shop has really nice people working there, they are open late for those of us who work, and were able to do a diagnostic faster than the 48 hour time frame they gave me. It costs $0 for a diagnostic if they can't provide a solution, which is better than other companies in Chicago who charge $29.99 to just look at the phone. Hopefully I won't have to come back here, however if my new 6S ends up in water again, I would definitely use this company.

11.description: I can't even with this place.  I cracked my screen.  It was fine for a while.  But then the display started to go.  Then it was unresponsive.  I bought a repair credit for UBreakifFix, but didnt really expect that they would be able to help.  I took my phone in, and they fixed it while I waited.  Granted, I waited for about an hour, hour and a half.  But, they fixed it.  Brilliant.  Will definitely go back.

39.description: It is very hard to find electronic fixers that are not money hungry and excellent service. Thank you ubreakIfixit and Rob for showing that! Before taking anything into apple, I highly recommend that you consider this amazing team! Excellent excellent excellent.

37.description: Let me first start by complimenting the young lady at the counter, Ms. Alena was very pleasant and professional. She assured  me that my shattered cracked screen on my iPhone 6 wasn't too bad (I was having a meltdown). With the yelp deal the price wasn't bad, just under a hundred. Verizon wanted $200 and apple wanted $150ish. Not only did I save money by they finished in less than a half hour. My phone looks brand spanking new. Thanks Guys (and gal). I hope I never experience this again but if I do, I know where to come. I would definitely recommend this place

0.description: Always a great feeling to get your iPhone screened fixed, and even a better feeling getting a coupon off Yelp!!! Make sure you're ready for leg day when you go up to the store! Staff was super friendly and great to talk to.!! They really know what they are doing and they are there to help!

38.description: This place is awesome! My iPhone was broken (the screen shut off, blank) and i was really worried. I went to Apple Genius Bar on North Ave. They said my phone is dead and suggested me to buy a new one (of course!) however i didn't think my phone was dead because i could hear when it rang but i could not pick it up because the screen was blank, i couldn't swipe open the screen.luckily I found this place, EDDY who looked at my phone, went in the office then a few minutes later he came out and said its fixed!!! Really? Unbelievable!!! Apple Genius Bar couldn't fix it! EDDY wouldn't even charge me for this because he said it took just a few minutes to fix!!! Amazing! This place is good at what they do, nice and professional. I highly recommend. Apple Genius Bar? Not so genius.

51.description: My phone is fixed! For that, I'm happy. It took about an hour and I was able to do a little shopping on North Ave. However, their prices are the exact same as Apple. As just a dealer, their prices should and could be a little less than Apple's. Otherwise, the I'm happy. CS was great.

27.description: I'm so thoroughly unimpressed with this store. I came in for a screen replacement on my phone. They didn't put the screen on correctly. So I return and drop my phone off. 3 days later they call to say that they need to fix the battery, and that's their reason why the screen wasn't on right After the battery was "replaced" they call me in. I travel all the way back to this store, just so they could tell me they didn't check to see if the new battery worked. And lone behold, the new battery didn't work. So now I'm waiting ANOTHER week to get my phone back This has been a long and painful process that wouldn't have happened if the workers had done their job correctly and hadn't have called and lied to me about my phone being "ready for pickup"I'm angry. I've wasted so much time traveling and have had my phone there for way too longI will NEVER bring another phone here. Ever.

32.description: So, two days after I write the review, I get a call from corporate. I spoke to Jill, who was nice, polite and sympathetic. She forwarded me to the location in the South Loop, where they replaced my front panel and display.They then told me even that might not stick because its probable that the body frame of my phone was damaged in the last repair, and I'll need a really good phone case to hold it together. When I told this to Jill, she sent a Otterbox Defender case to me through the mail. The phone looks good and is better now, but all this could have been avoided in the first place. I'm adding two stars to the review for the extraordinary service I was offered by Jill. Thanks a lot.

54.description: Shattered smartphone screen? "Accidentally" giving your phone a bath? Didn't buy phone insurance? U Break I Fix is for you!! Same day repairs (I was quoted an hour with an appointment but they were already behind when I arrived. Took hour and a half). Still not bad considering. Prices are a little high- $149 for glass repair on my Samsung Galaxy. But if you check in on Facebook they'll give you 5% off. I guess that saved me half of the sales tax the lovely city of Chicago charges. Make an appointment online or just walk in. I'd suggest an appt because this place is hopping. Too many clumsy phone users out there. Line out the door and all the seats in the waiting area filled when I walked in. Also, just in case they need to order a part make an appt. They'll call you if they have questions prior to your appt. Located above a nail salon and insurance agency right across from the North and Clybourn red line stop. Street parking available. Plus you can grab some eats or do a little window shopping while you wait for your phone to be fixed. 90 day work guarantee. Now don't be so clumsy and drop your phone again after getting it fixed!

48.description: I shattered  the screen of my phone and had to order a part from china. I called  and  asked one of the techs at UbreakIFix if they could repair my screen and they  made sure I ordered the right part. The part finally  arrived and I called them to make sure they could fix it. They reassured me they could and told me to bring it in. I brought  it in and they looked at the phone and the part and said I needed an additional part and they couldn't replace my screen. I told them  this was the right part and all they needed for the repair.  They insisted I send the part back for a refund (to China )  and send the phone back to ASUS  for a repair.  I told them there was a young lady on youtube who performed the repair with no tech experience.  They insisted the repair couldn't be done properly by them. I called several places and all of them were scared or didn't  want to bother with fixing my phone. I called NOVAFIX , told them I had the part and asked if the could fix it. They said  "sure bring it in , we'll have it done in an hr or less". They  fixed it in 35 seconds and couldn't understand why  UbreakIFix couldn't fix it. Glad I got my phone fixed , no thanks to the people over at UbreakIFix, Lincoln Park location.

44.description: Talk about customer service! So, semi long story- I shattered my iPhone screen (for the second time- I'm a klutz) and took it to uBreakiFix for same day replacement at a lower price than Apple. It was ready promptly in less than an hour and looked great! However, problems arose when I took it home and the screen was occasionally a little "glitchy" in a way it hadn't been before (a Google search tells me that this can be known to happen when replacing the iPhone screen). I called uBreakiFix and they were totally nice about me bringing it back in for them to look at it. After some time waiting for it to get glitchy again so they could see what was going on, they agreed to replace the screen. This is where things went downhill for my phone. Apparently, when they tried to swap out screens, my phone flat out refused to work! Ahh! To make matters worse, I was leaving in less than 48 hours for a 5 week trip and desperately needed a working phone. My tight timeline meant that they didn't have enough time to run diagnostics on it and figure out what was going on. So, because they're the best and they stand by their work, they decided to just replace my phone with a brand new one- at no cost to me. AND, because they could only get an appointment at the Apple store after they closed, the manager Eddy stayed late and drove it to me.  I repeat- HE DROVE THE PHONE TO ME so I wouldn't have to go out of my way. Unbelievable. I honestly have never had better customer service. They took a stressful, potentially disastrous situation and turned it into one that I am constantly raving about to my friends. So, in summary, should I ever need any further iPhone/iPad/whatever work done, I will be taking it to uBreakiFix for the best customer service imaginable, and you should be too!

24.description: They were great. Efficient, professional, got the job done fast and right! Would definitely recommend.

7.description: I would highly recommend this place.  I brought in my water damaged Iphone and in 30 minutes I walked out with a completely working phone.  The guy that I dealt with, Robert, was kind and extremely helpful.  Now I just need to keep my phone out of water!

49.description: Took my Mac in for service June 26. Having not heard from them I called July 10 to find computer was ready and they tried to leave a message. When I was picking up the lost my charger and accused me of not leaving it as they do not take chargers. Then why did the clerk ask me if I left a charger?  When I refused to pay full price and said I would leave if they didn't agree the guy said they would call the cops. Wait, call the cops because you lost my charger?  I asked to talk to the owner. I still want to talk to the owner.

40.description: My phone screen was fixed without an issue.  I did price match with another cell phone repair service because they advertised this on their site like crazy.  $99 for an iphone 6 screen repair.  They didn't make me feel good about the price match and gave me problems with it because the guy I dropped my phone off with was not the one that gave me my invoice.  They quoted me an hour, it took 2.  I don't mind waiting 2 hours.. just be honest with me about how long this will take.

53.description: I went there to get my iphone camera cleaned from the inside because it was dusty and I could no longer do video conferencing. I asked if it is something they do, how long and how much it would cost. The answer I got was "20 minutes, free of charge".For a first impression, it really worked. It will be hard for me to go somewhere else when my iphone needs a repair!

30.description: Easiest thing in the world. Screen cracked into a million pieces on my iPhone 6. Pricey but it's worth it for the convenience and professionalism. In and out in under 40 min. Do it. Get the voucher.

46.description: Did great work! Honored their quote even though the repair was more complex than originally expected. Have recommended them to many of my friends.

1.description: This place is the real deal. It's funny because I would have never found/heard of it if it wasn't for an employee at the Apple store down the block who recommended it to me too.  So I dropped my phone at Big Star one night, went into Apple and they wanted $175 to replace the screen!! I gagged. That is wayyyyy to much for a screen swap.  I took the Apple employee's advice, walked a couple blocks down to UbreakiFix and now I tell all my friends about it. They did the screen replacement for only 100 bucks. Heck yes. This place is tight. =)

55.description: After driving all over the city, visiting countless repair shops that were seriously overpriced, I was recommended by a friend to visit UBreakIFix. Thank you so much for repairing my cracked  screen and doing it in such a great time frame. The location of the business is great, so while you wait, go shopping, have a beer or a mani-pedi. All in all, great service. Would definitely recommend them in the future.

9.description: SOMETHING HAS GONE SERIOUSLY WRONG AT THIS PLACE SINCE MY ORIGINAL REVIEW.In short: brought my phone in for a simple repair.  They fried it.  Then (probably knowingly) gave me an obviously defective phone as a replacement, and refused to admit it is defective.  Along they way they did not keep commitments, gave me the run around, and kept me without the use of my phone for weeks.  I would never use this place again, there are plenty of other places that repair phones.  Unless you are willing to risk having this happen to you, AVOID AT ALL COSTS.  AVOID AVOID AVOID.The longer version:I brought my phone with a broken screen to this location.  They replaced the screen and gave it back to me. When they handed it back to me it would not turn on, which they told me was because it needed to be charged.  When I got it home I discovered it would not take a charge and when I brought it back, they looked at it and concluded that their technician had actually ruined the phone and that they would replace it.  They told me they would call me when they had a replacement.That would've been fine.  But what really happened was:* They never called, I had to finally call them to see what was going on.* They gave me a phone of the same model and told me that it was 'brand new' even though they did not give me the manual, charger, etc. that would come with a new phone.* The phone they gave me clearly suffers from well-known problems that some phones of this type have: camera light sensor does not function properly so picture quality is terrible.* A related problem is that phone auto shut off function (for when you stick it in your pocket) is triggered by same light sensor issue.  So the phone turns itself off unless it is opened in very bright light.* The phone I brought them did not suffer from either of these problems.* I demonstrated the problems to them. First they told me that it had to do with the phone case, then they told me that they swapped several camera parts in and out of the phone and couldn't make a difference.  Then they told me that there was nothing wrong with the phone.* Repeatedly told me that they couldn't help me until they spoke to their "District Manager" who they would NOT put me in contact with.  A silly ploy ripped from the pages of used car sales, which should give you a pretty good sense of the ethics of this place.Again:  AVOID AVOID AVOID

26.description: I imagine they're great at changing a screen on the iphone, but they mangled my laptop when I went to have the screen replaced.I give them 2 stars instead of just one because after some back and forth (they fixed the screen but destroyed the WiFi antenna) they replaced my machine with a refurbished one.That machine however was not equal to the machine they mangled (smaller hard drive, etc.), and has since died after only a few months. I can't speak to phone repairs, but I would avoid them for laptop/tablet work.

25.description: Great customer service. Super quick fix. I think the phone screen was fixed in 25 minutes!!! It was very expensive, that's the one downfall. :( There was a Yelp coupon for pay $35 and get $50 I used to save a little. This was a Samsung screen fix for $180, I believe. I had my iPhone 6 screen redone at an Apple Store for SIGNIFICANTLY less than the $180 here. (Maybe that's just the Samsung vs Apple IPhone pricing?) I got it fixed for a friend of mine. She seemed to think that price was comparable to other prices she received elsewhere. So she had no problem with me taking the phone there.

12.description: I'm so thoroughly unimpressed with this store. I came in for a screen replacement on my phone. They didn't put the screen on correctly. So I return and drop my phone off. 3 days later they call to say that they need to fix the battery, and that's their reason why the screen wasn't on right After the battery was "replaced" they call me in. I travel all the way back to this store, just so they could tell me they didn't check to see if the new battery worked. And lone behold, the new battery didn't work. So now I'm waiting ANOTHER week to get my phone back This has been a long and painful process that wouldn't have happened if the workers had done their job correctly and hadn't have called and lied to me about my phone being "ready for pickup"I'm angry. I've wasted so much time traveling and have had my phone there for way too longI will NEVER bring another phone here. Ever.

59.description: i paid 105$ to change my I5 screen and when i paid they promised a 90 days guarantee .. after 2 weeks the screen cracked i went back to them and they said no cover pay again .Im so disappointed .

21.description: This place is crazy fast with reasonable prices. The customer service is spectacular. They are amazing!!!!

17.description: My iPhone screen was shattered in a million pieces so I brought it here for a repair at 10am. They didn't have the part so I left my phone with them. They told me the part would be in at 3pm but it came early and my phone was ready for pickup at 1pm. They did a great job on the screen and the price is the same or cheaper than anything else I've researched.

10.description: I had a great experience here!  They checked my Wii U unit within 4 days after dropping it off at store, and then called me to discuss the problem. They were able to fix the unit and it cost half the $ Nintendo wanted (not including shipping the unit to/from Nintendo). I was very pleased and would definitely recommend them to anyone for repairs for game systems!

5.description: I set an appointment to have my shattered iPhone screen replaced.  After receiving a confirmation email, I also received an email asking if it was a white or black iPhone. Not seeing the email until the morning of my appt I responded and showed for my appt.  when I arrived they didn't seem to have my appt in the system and then told me that they could not repair it. They then went on to tell me that I didn't respond to the email inquiring about the color of the iPhone quickly enough and THAT is why the part was not held for me.   Seeing that they could have called me BEFORE I came in for my appointment but didn't I feel that that care very little about their customers.  Also, I then went and walked in the Jet Device repair and had my phone fixed immediately.  They also informed me that the COLOR of the phone didn't matter so long as they had the screen for generation/ model in stock. Which I also called and confirmed with my phone carrier.  Basically, U break it I fix it screwed up and then blamed me.

3.description: Every excuse in the book used to not meet their price match policy.Was misquoted over the phone and told a much higher number in person.  I do not recommend going to this store.  So many better options elsewhere.

35.description: My phone screen was absolutely shattered and I did not want to have to buy a brand new one. I found this place on Yelp and saw that they had a $50 for $35 voucher and the reviews were great. Thought I'd give it a try. I didn't have anything to lose considering how bad my phone was broken. I brought my phone in and they were able to fix the screen within 30 minutes. It looks brand new and the customer service was great. I'd definitely recommend uBreakiFix!

19.description: Excellent costumer service!! Will definitely return for future repairs!

28.description: They fixed my phone FAST! Very grateful!I thought I was going to have to buy a whole new phone but john hooked me up and within minutes I was out the door. Happy customer.

45.description: i took my phone in on Friday to have it fixed.  I'd been having problems with the charging port and the cost of fixing it was a lot cheaper than replacing my phone.  I gave it to they guy, he looked, asked me to wait, and came back 5 minutes later with it fixed and ready to go.   He just needed to clean out the built up lint.  Since I was there, I also decide to ask about the front facing camera because the camera was cloudy.  He looks and says he should be able to clean it.  He took my phone, was gone maybe 10 minutes and brings it back, and the camera is clear.  I asked how much and there was no charge.  The service was great, the guy was friendly and helpful, and I was in and out in no time.  If I have any other problems with my phone, I'm going there.

33.description: Came in Saturday afternoon, rather busy. I needed a glass repair and they quoted me 45 minutes. I arrived 50 minutes later and they said the phone would still be 15 minutes. I waited very patiently, but they did not address me after 15 minutes and only paid attention to the 2 new customers that came in over the extra 40 minutes that I waited. The wrong phone was grabbed and she said via the receipt it matched. It was not my phone. She went back to look for my phone, grabbed it and apologized. She also said it had been ready FOR A WHILE! Took a total of 90 minutes for me to get my phone, and I waited an extra 40 minutes for it in the store, when it was done. The employees have to address their customers and pay attention. My phone is fixed and good to go, but I feel like I just wasted so much time.

43.description: Long time Yelper, first time reviewer.  But I'd say it's warranted given that uBreakiFix fixed my iPhone 6 for free - in seconds - just a minute after I walked in the door.  It wasn't a huge/serious issue, but still.The slider button on my phone to toggle between silent and non-silent mode had apparently gotten jammed, and was stuck in silent mode.  I suspect a grain of sand got in there while I was out at the beach over the weekend.I called, they said to bring it in and they'll take a look for free.  The employee (didn't catch her name) was very friendly, immediately took it to the back of the store, and came back seconds later saying she was able to remove whatever debris was in there.It was free of charge, and she wouldn't accept a tip, so I offered to write this review!  Cheers.

2.description: Have taken my iPhone here twice already. Awesome (friendly) staff, clean space, reasonable rates for the work they do. However, the only reason they don't get the full five stars is because both times I got my iPhone back fixed but with minor mistakes. The first (on my iPhone 5) the home button was able to move around (the little design on it was sometimes a square sometimes a diamond), on my iPhone 6 when the screen was put back on it wasn't pressed all the way so now it feels "clicky". These mistakes aren't earth shattering  but still a little annoying. UbreakIfix does have warranty so I'm sure they would've fixed it if I had the time to go back again, but it's still better for the more busy people nowadays to have things done right the first time. Regardless, I do recommend them. Go there if you need any phone repairs, just make sure to double check the work thoroughly before leaving!

18.description: I have never written a bad yelp review before, but I am so disappointed with this place that I felt i needed to tell others. My experience with this store was always good. I never had too many problems. However, this time around... It was horrible. Absolutely nothing went well. I dropped my iPad off because the LED light had become unplugged. The iPad would turn on, but it wouldn't light up. When I dropped it off they told me one week max, to give me a diagnosis. I thought that was a little long, especially because I told them what the problem was. But I agreed to the wait time and submitted the iPad to them for a diagnosis. After a week, I never got a call to tell me that it had been diagnosed. I called and they said to give them a couple more days, and they would call me by the end of the following business day. The told me that the technician was currently working on my iPad, and that he didn't know what the diagnosis was yet but would let me know very soon. I agreed to wait longer. The time came and when again. No call. I called a THIRD time. I was told they had never got to my iPad and hadn't had a chance to diagnose it. I stated that I was told a couple days earlier, that the technician was working on it. They didn't have an explanation for that and simply said "well we haven't gotten to it yet. We're understaffed". I said "well how much more time do you need?" They said 3 more days. I agreed to wait longer... Again.Three days later... No call. I called again, they said they STILL hadn't had a chance to look at it. I stated that I'd just come pick it up and to forget about diagnosing it, I'll be taking it somewhere else. When I went to pick it up there was a woman in front of me dropping her device off for repair. I couldn't help but notice that they said they would have it fixed within an hour. I thought "An hour?! I've been waiting 2 weeks just for a diagnosis. An hour?!"I got my iPad back after two weeks of them doing absolutely nothing. They were dismissive in their willingness to understand my frustration and did NOTHING to accommodate me, despite false quote times and false promises to contact me. This was one of the worst experiences I've ever had with a company. I'll never go back.

41.description: Broke my iPhone 5SThey fixed itJob well done

52.description: My iPhone battery hadn't been able to hold a charge for weeks, I thought it needed to be replaced.  Phone just needed a little cleaning, which took just a few seconds.  They could have easily changed out the battery, but Jon solved the issue quickly, free of charge.  I appreciate the integrity.  They also fixed a broken iPod too in the past, which has worked great since. I highly recommend this place for an honest appraisal, good work, and quick turnaround.
